Uses of Interface
optimization.stochastic.algorithms.OptimizationAlgorithmInterface

  • Packages that use OptimizationAlgorithmInterface 
    Package Description
    optimization.stochastic.algorithms  

    • Uses of OptimizationAlgorithmInterface in optimization.stochastic.algorithms

      Classes in optimization.stochastic.algorithms that implement OptimizationAlgorithmInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DifferentialEvolution
      A class that implements differential evolution on float vectors.
      class  GABasicFitnessProportional
      This class implements the basic GA protocol where the selection probability for the solutions is proportional to their fitness.
      class  GABasicTSel
      This class implements a tournament selection based genetic algorithm for optimization.
      class  GAIslandModel
      This class implements the island model of GA optimization where there are multiple separate solution subpopulations that occasionally communicate, so that they can in principle search different parts of the data space, but also horizontally transfer some of the acquired knowledge to enrich the local search process.
      class  HillClimbing
      This class implements a simple hill climbing optimization procedure.
      class  HillClimbingLeap
      A class that implements a simple twist to the basic hill-climbing approach, by introducing a small probability of making larger changes, 'leaps' towards unexplored parts of the optimization landscape.
      class  PPPSO
      This class implements the standard predator-prey particle swarm optimization method.
      class  SimulatedThermicAnnealing
      A class that implements simple simulated thermic annealing.
      class  SimulatedThermicAnnealingLeap
      A class that implements a simple twist to simulated thermic annealing, by introducing a possibility of occasional large leaps.
